content: उपधृ {1} {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To hold up, support, sustain. {@--2@} To bear, carry. {@--3@} To hold as, consider or regard as; सत्त्वं तदुपधारयेत् <ls>Ms. 12. 27</ls>; <ls>Bg. 7. 6</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">9. 6.</ls> {@--4@} To comprehend, perceive, hear, experience, observe; पुरुषो रामचरितश्रवणैरुपधारयन् <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--5@} To reflect or meditate upon.
